/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, rise majestically against the backdrop of the sky, their glass windows reflecting the sunlight. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. On the right side of the street, a row of shops and restaurants can be seen, their colorful signs and awnings adding a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette of the buildings. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
